content: I'm glad you're willing to help me break down this project. The goal is to launch a new marketing campaign, and I'm responsible for creating the content calendar. I've been feeling anxious about it because I want to make sure it's perfect and it's a lot of work. As for my preferred approach, I usually use lists and timelines. I've been using Todoist to organize my tasks, but I'm open to other suggestions if you have any.
